ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 240
ygData.msgSnippet: I can t remember if it was guardians or swirlspines, but one of them was pretty easy to Mez and the other was damn near impossible. Klayan Deathbringer (lvl 50
ygData.messageBody:
I can't remember if it was guardians or swirlspines, but one of them was
pretty easy to Mez and the other was damn near impossible.

Klayan Deathbringer (lvl 50 Nec) Veeshan


>From: Andrew Collins <ACollins@...>
>Reply-To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
>To: "'eqenchanters@onelist.com'" <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 240
>Date: Fri, 3 Mar 2000 09:36:10 -0600
>
> >Um... if the stun does no damage, mes isn't broken. This includes the
> >colour series- shows that they are stunned, but sit there like happy
>little
> >campers....
>
>Color series break mes... stuns break mes. Try it.
>
> >Are able to be messed- else the last 2 pulls would be suicide. Have you
> >actually tried this, because it works for our group 100% of the time
> >(barring resists of course...)??? The swirlspines and the guardians HAVE
> >to be messed or pulling Phinigel would be inviting a HUGE CR.
>
>Well, I cant say Ive tried extensivly... but, I have tried to mes the
>guardian, and regular swirlpine horses to no avail. Like I said tho I
>havent
>tried it extensively, but I have asked numerous 50 enchanters across the
>Veeshan server and most have told me they cannot be mesd. If they CAN be
>mesd it will take many attempts to get one because of the seahorses ultra
>high MR.
>
>But we have also killed Phinigel without mes or charm. It's not easy, and
>we
>did have a few deaths, but a good group of 18-24 people can take him and
>his
>guards at once.
>
>When we go to Kedge again, I will attempt mes once more... i mean hell, if
>I
>can mes an Ashenbone Drake in Hate, i can mes a stupid seahorse right? =)
>
>Ill let you know next time I kill the big fish.
>
>-Maelael, 50th Enchanter, Veeshan.
>
>-----Original Message-----

>To: eqenchanters@onelist.com

> From: Stallion02@...
>Subject: Re: Happy Love Bracers spoiler
>
>The bracers were an item that had no real useful stats but looked like
>armor.
>
>Regarding Ratraz... Everytime that I /hail him he just says to buy

>
>or get out, does anyone know how to recieve the quest?
>
> Thanks again, Bactroban 11th lvl Enchantress

>Message: 4
> Date: Thu, 2 Mar 2000 21:07:31 EST
> From: Stallion02@...
>Subject: Re: RE: Stun and the Mes line...
>
>As a relatively newbie enchanter I have some spell questions, sorry if they
>seem stupid:
>
>If your pet is attacking while you cast mes will it continue to attack and
>break mes or will it stop?
>
>Does lull have any use during battle? Or is it just good for an initial
>pull
>
>from a camp?
>
>I know an MoB is a monster, but what does MoB stand for?
>
>
> Thanks For your patience,
> Bactroban
>
>
>____________________________________________________________________________
>___
>____________________________________________________________________________
>___
>
>Message: 5
> Date: Thu, 2 Mar 2000 20:56:03 -0800 (PST)
> From: Mark Rafn <dagon@...>
>Subject: Re: RE: Stun and the Mes line...
>
>Welcome to the list, and to the subtle power that is an enchanter's life.
>
>On Thu, 2 Mar 2000 Stallion02@... wrote:
>
> > If your pet is attacking while you cast mes will it continue to attack
>and
>
> > break mes or will it stop?
>
>It'll break mez. I'm used to playing a necro, so not having pet control
>is frustrating. It seems likely (and from what I've seen of higher-level
>enchanters) that you simply stop casting your animation spell in a lot of
>group situations - charm one as needed. When soloing or in a duo or trio,
>you maybe can instruct your tanks to assist your pet.
>
> > Does lull have any use during battle? Or is it just good for an initial
>pull
> > from a camp?
>
>Initial pull only.
>
> > I know an MoB is a monster, but what does MoB stand for?
>
>Mobile Object.
>--
>Mark Rafn dagon@... <http://www.dagon.net/> !G
>
>
>
>____________________________________________________________________________
>___
>____________________________________________________________________________
>___
>
>Message: 6
> Date: Thu, 2 Mar 2000 21:29:52 -0600
> From: "Deryn Morin" <deryn@...>
>Subject: Level 20 research pages .. and evil eye .. questions
>
>Does anyone know the best mobs to look for to get Tasarin's pages 30 and
>312
>for beserker strength and color shift spells. Since I fail repeatedly at
>making them, and I see no one auctioning these pages, at this rate I will
>be
>level 30 before I have them.
>
>And looking ahead a bit as well, where should I go for the level 24
>research
>pages as well.
>
>I was level 18 when I found out that Jonah and other Lake Rathe mobs give
>level 16 ones out like candy. Now those pages (for 16) are all I ever see
>anywhere (I practically throw them away I have so many), but there must be
>other treasure troves like Jonah for level 20 and 24 spells too (I hope).
>
>My poor (and I mean 'broke') level 21 enchantress has CHA and INT both just
>over 130. I am working hard on jewelcraft to try to fill in my (bare) ear
>slots, and wrist slots in particular, but she currently sports damask or
>leather or cloth underwear. A second question I have is .. at what level
>can
>I successfully do Evil Eyes in the gorge (given the above stats, and with a
>magic resist of 57).
>
>My druid, with a partner druid, has a lot of trouble with them at level
>25/26 (magic resist at base 25) but since evil eyes are enchanters, I hoped
>we might be more successful at earlier levels?
>
> I (my enchanter) often group with a level 21 cleric but I think we might
>need another tank type to help out (unless my pet can take on that role?)
>Evil eyes often seem to have both an animation and a mino pet, and they
>throw blindness, fear, debuffs and charm on us. Can be wild there. Fun but
>I
>am going steadily backwards with my druid so far.
>
>Thanks for any help you can give me. I enjoy this list very much.
>
>Chiasma
>21st season, Fennin Ro
>
>
>____________________________________________________________________________
>___
>____________________________________________________________________________
>___
>
>Message: 7
> Date: Thu, 2 Mar 2000 20:45:27 -0800
> From: "Garett" <osmosis@...>
>Subject: Re: RE: Stun and the Mes line...
>
> > If your pet is attacking while you cast mes will it continue to attack
>and
> > break mes or will it stop?
>
>Nope, our pets have no brains and will continue to attack, breaking mez
>
> >
> > Does lull have any use during battle? Or is it just good for an initial
>pull
> > from a camp?
> >
>
>Its only good for a)initial pull and b)suicide since its highly resistable
>
> > I know an MoB is a monster, but what does MoB stand for?
> >
>
>Mobile Object, Moving Object, or something akin to that.
>
>Cogg
>
>PS. there are no stupid questions.
>
>
>

>Message: 9
> Date: Fri, 03 Mar 2000 09:09:44 GMT
> From: refplace@...
>Subject: Re: RE: Stun and the Mes line...
>
>MoB is an old acronym for Mobile Offensive something or other I think.
>Yes your pet will continue to attack and break Mez.
>Lull is designed for pulls but the longer lasting versions lower a
>monsters yell for help radius so can keep them from bringing others once
>the battle has begun.
>However they must be cast before combat and don't last very long so best
>use is to help break a camp.
>Stonedreamer
>
>
>
>

>Message: 10
> Date: Fri, 03 Mar 2000 10:19:16 GMT
> From: refplace@...
>Subject: Re: Level 20 research pages .. and evil eye .. questions
>
>Mez the pet first. If you then pop the eye before the mez wears off the
>pet should pop.
>I have done this in east karana with the Evil Eye that wanders there.
>We had a party and killed the eye fast.
>I am 16 and on fenin. Love to buy those pages your throwing away by the
>way ;)
>Stonedreamer of Fenin Ro and EQPortal.com
>
>
>
